alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Shishmaref; St Lawrence Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 9:54PM AKST until December 13 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected with low visibilities. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibilities as low as one half mile at times. * WHERE...Diomede, Bering Strait Coast, and St Lawrence Island. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds will increase into Monday morning and continue to strengthen through the day. In additional to reducing visibility to a half mile at times, strong winds and waves could also lead to heavy freezing spray which may create light ice accumulations on surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Bering Strait Coast; Shishmaref; St Lawrence Island
